Html:
Hi! I would like to generate a png from a graph on aspx, but I don't know how can I do it. I've tried an approach like http://graphsharp.codeplex.com/discussions/63915, but I'm getting an imagem with all vertices overlapped. I believe I'm saving the graph before Layout has finished performing.

Does anyone knows how to do this?

 

Thanks a lot,

Leonardo Silva.
Have you tried my Google Visualizations for .NET [http://googlevisnet.codeplex.com/] project?  Did it work for you?  I think it would be good for simple items.

Hi Juls. I've a WPF application that already uses Graph# so I'd like to use the same library (and the same code) to produce the graphs...

Anyway, thanks for the suggestion.

Regards,

Leonardo Silva.
